prompt: Think of a time you were pleasantly surprised by yourself.
Think of a time when you were disappointed by someone you held in high regard.
Think of a time you felt like you could do anything.
Think of a time you felt completely at ease in the company of the people around you.
Think of a time you knew the person you were with understood you on a deep level.
Think of a time you overcame a challenge you once thought was impossible.
Think of a time you felt truly proud of an accomplishment.
Think of a time you felt deep gratitude for something in your life.
Think of a time you felt unexpectedly comforted by someone.
Think of a time you realized how much you've grown as a person.
Think of a time you felt let down by someone you trusted.
Think of a time you had to let go of something important to you.
Think of a time you felt completely alone in a crowded place.
Think of a time when you felt like everything was going against you.
Think of a time you regretted not taking an opportunity.
Think of a time you felt proud of someone else's success.
Think of a time you experienced a moment of pure excitement.
Think of a time you felt deeply connected to a piece of music or art.
Think of a time you successfully resolved a conflict with someone.
Think of a time when you faced criticism and used it to improve.
